alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:06PM AKDT until March 30 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will move into the area this evening. Winds are expected to decrease Thursday morning with visibility improving then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
